entry.title: 打字时电脑突然死机怎么办？
极简主义
entry.content: 2、纺锤形： 3、右边渐变透明： 4、左边渐变透明： 5、虚线： 6、双线： 7、立体效果： 8、钢针效果： document.querySelectorAll('.github-emoji') .forEach(el => { if (!el.dataset.src) { return; } const img = document.createElement('img'); img.style = 'display:none !important;'; img.src = el.dataset.src; img.addEventListener('error', () => { img.remove(); el.style.color = 'inherit'; el.style.backgroundImage = 'none'; el.style.background = 'none'; }); img.addEventListener('load', () => { img.remove(); }); document.body.appendChild(img); });

entry.title: 用Python下载视频
entry.content: 概论 介绍如何用python:下载音悦台原画视频:✔下载B站标清视频:待更新批量下载抖音视频:待更新下载腾讯非VIP视频:待更新 一般而言，各大app或网站都有直接下载的按钮，但是它们往往会对视频的格式进行转化，使得下载的视频只能在站内播放，会对下载的视频的清晰度有限制，如果要下载原画视频往往要开通会员才行。这里提供几个先下载视频的方法。 1.QQ浏览器，简直就是下载神器啊，将视频的网页链接复制到QQ浏览器进行播放，很多视频会显示下载按钮，点击下载按钮进行下载就行了(经常用这种方法下载微博里面的视频)，不过这种方法所下载的视频很多都是360p标清的，无法提高视频清晰度(网易云音乐使用这种方法下载视频不会被压缩)。 演示如下： 2.Chrome的开发者工具，审查元素，查看源码，直接找到视频链接进行下载。网页都是用html和php写的，网页里的视频都是将云端链接嵌入到代码中，只要找到这个链接，就能直接下载视频(音乐也一样)，一般而言，各大视频网站为了防止这种方法下载视频，都会对视频链接进行加密，使得找到的视频链接不能直接直接转换为视频，有些则无法查看视频链接。公司大小与视频链接加密程度貌似是成正比。就比如：音悦台有些视频查看源码后很快就能找到链接进行下载。。。注意要切换成html5播放器模式，方便找链接。 演示如下： 3.更高级一点的方法就是使用代码啦，不仅可以下载视频，还可以选择更高的清晰度进行下载！ 用python下载音悦台原画视频演示如下： Your browser does not support the video tag.代码如下：123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748import reimport requestsimport clickfrom contextlib import closingdef Spider(url): mvid = url.split('/')[-1] info_url = 'http://www.yinyuetai.com/insite/get-video-info?flex=true&videoId={}'.format(mvid) res = requests.get(info_url) html = res.text rule = re.compile(r'http://\w*?\.yinyuetai\.com/uploads/videos/common/.*?(?=&br)') results = re.findall(rule, html) num = len(results) print('[HELP]:This mv has %d levels,so enter 1-%d...' % (num, num)) print('[HELP]:The greater number, the better mv...') choice = input('Choose the mv quality:') try: choice = int(choice) except: print('[Warning]:Enter error,auto choose the worst mv...') choice = 1 try: mv_url = results[choice-1] except: if choice < 1: mv_url = results[0] else: mv_url = results[-1] print('<Download link>: \n%s' % mv_url) with closing(requests.get(mv_url, stream=True)) as res: total_size = int(res.headers['content-length']) if res.status_code == 200: label = '[FileSize]:%0.2f MB' % (total_size/(1024*1024)) with click.progressbar(length=total_size, label=label) as progressbar: with open(mvid+'.mp4', "wb") as f: for chunk in res.iter_content(chunk_size=1024): if chunk: f.write(chunk) progressbar.update(1024) else: print('[ERROR]:Connect error...')if __name__ == '__main__': print('[INFO]:yinyuetai mv downloader...') print('[URL]:http://www.yinyuetai.com') print('[Author]:Charles') url = input('Enter the mv url you want to download:') Spider(url)#可以在此处直接将url替换成要要下载的视频链接 document.querySelectorAll('.github-emoji') .forEach(el => { if (!el.dataset.src) { return; } const img = document.createElement('img'); img.style = 'display:none !important;'; img.src = el.dataset.src; img.addEventListener('error', () => { img.remove(); el.style.color = 'inherit'; el.style.backgroundImage = 'none'; el.style.background = 'none'; }); img.addEventListener('load', () => { img.remove(); }); document.body.appendChild(img); });

entry.title: 博客颜色的选取
entry.content: 一个网站要想获得更高的访问量，无非就是要在两点上下功夫，一是超高的颜值，而是丰富的内容。网站的颜色是我精心调配过了的，只为在视觉上呈现出最好的效果，下面贴出我的网站的各种细节的颜色，三位数对应颜色的rgb值，有些颜色有特定的名字，我都写出来了，没写名字的是没查到的，这里推荐一个RGB颜色值与十六进制颜色码转换工具取色器推荐QQ,没错就是QQ，QQ聊天界面的截图工具简直就是取色神器，鼠标点击哪里就能显示出对应颜色的rgb值，非常方便。 调节网站的各种颜色实在CSS样式里面，文件位置 blog\themes\next\source\css\_custom\custom.styl下面贴出我的custom.styl文件，所对应的各种颜色和样式在注释中都有说明，大家对照着去改就行了。 // Custom styles. //themes/next/source/css/_variables/custom.styl 调整内容宽度与字体 // 页面最顶部的横线 .headband { height: 1.5px; background-image: linear-gradient(90deg, #F79533 0%, #F37055 15%, #EF4E7B 30%, #A166AB 44%, #5073B8 58%, #1098AD 72%, #07B39B 86%, #6DBA82 100%); } // 页面顶部行高 .header { line-height: 1.5; } // 页面留白更改 .header-inner { padding-top: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; } .posts-expand { padding-top: 80px; } .posts-expand .post-meta { margin: 5px 0px 0px 0px; } .post-button { margin-top: 0px; } // 顶栏宽度 .container .header-inner { width: 100%; } //站点名背景 .header { background: url("http://phaaflp9b.bkt.clouddn.com/header-bg.jpg"); //background-position-y: -15vh; } // 站点名字体 .site-title { font-size: 30px; font-weight: bold; color: rgb(230,230,250); line-height: 80px; letter-spacing: 3px; } // 站点子标题 .site-subtitle{ margin: 0px; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: 1px; padding-bottom: 3px; font-weight: bold; color: rgb(245,222,179); border-bottom-width: 3px; border-bottom-style: solid; border-bottom-color: rgb(240,128,128);//站点名和子标题之间的横线 } // 菜单 .menu { text-align: center; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 5px; background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.75); box-shadow: 0px 10px 10px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15); } // 菜单超链接字体大小 .menu .menu-item a { font-size: 15px; } // 菜单各项边距 .menu .menu-item { margin: 5px 15px; } // 菜单超链接样式 .menu .menu-item a:hover { border-bottom-color: rgba(161, 102, 171, 0); } @media (max-width: 767px){ .menu { margin-top: 20px; } .menu .menu-item a { padding: 4px 10px; color: #0f2e41; background: rgba(255,253,192,0.1); &:hover { background: #ddd; } } .site-nav { background: rgba(255,255,255,0.9); } } //内容区 h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 { font-weight:900; } // 自定义的文章摘要图片样式 img.img-topic { width: 100%; } // 自定义的文章置顶样式 .post-sticky-flag { font-size: inherit; float: left; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); cursor: help; transition-duration: 0.2s; transition-timing-function: ease-in-out; transition-delay: 0s; } .post-sticky-flag:hover { color: #07b39b; } // 文章 .post { margin-bottom: 50px; padding: 45px 36px 36px 36px; box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); } // 文章标题字体 .posts-expand .post-title { font-size: 26px; font-weight: 700; } // 文章标题动态效果 .posts-expand .post-title-link::before { background-image: linear-gradient(90deg, #a166ab 0%, #ef4e7b 25%, #f37055 50%, #ef4e7b 75%, #a166ab 100%); } // [Read More]按钮样式 .post-button .btn { color: #555 !important; background-color: rgb(240,230,140); border-radius: 3px; font-size: 15px; box-shadow: inset 0px 0px 10px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.35); border: none !important; transition-property: unset; padding: 0px 15px; } .post-button .btn:hover { color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important; border-radius: 3px; font-size: 15px; box-shadow: inset 0px 0px 10px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.35); background-image: linear-gradient(90deg, #a166ab 0%, #ef4e7b 25%, #f37055 50%, #ef4e7b 75%, #a166ab 100%); } //修改默认按钮样式 .post-button { text-align: right; } .btn { padding: 3px 15px color: #fff !important; background-color: #bdc3c7; border: 0px; border-radius: 15px; &:hover { color: #fff !important; background: #34495e; text-decoration: none !important; } } @media (max-width: 767px) { .post-button { margin-right: 18px; } } // 去除在页面文章之间的分割线 .posts-expand .post-eof { margin: 0px; background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0); } // 去除页面底部页码上面的横线 .pagination { border: none; margin: 0px; } // 页面底部页码 .pagination .page-number.current { border-radius: 100%; box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5); background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.35); } .pagination .prev, .pagination .next, .pagination .page-number { margin-bottom: 10px; border: none; } .pagination .space { color: rgb(255, 255, 255); } // 页面底部页脚 *** .footer { line-height: 1.5; background-color: rgba(135,206,235, 0.75); color: #333; border-top-width: 3px; border-top-style: solid; border-top-color: rgb(240,128,128);//文章和页脚之间分割线的颜色 box-shadow: 0px -10px 10px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15); } // 文章底部留白更改 .post-widgets { padding-top: 0px; } .post-nav { margin-top: 30px; } // 文章底部页面跳转 .post-nav-item a { color: rgb(238,130,238);//跳转前 font-weight: bold; } .post-nav-item a:hover { color: rgb(60,179,113);//跳转颜色 font-weight: bold; } // 文章底部评论 .comments { background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.35); margin: 80px 0px 40px 0px; } // 超链接样式 a { color: rgb(65,105,225);//分享前 包含标题按钮，底部分享，标签，分类，评论 border-bottom-color: rgb(0,0,0); } a:hover { color: rgb(240,128,128);//分享颜色 border-bottom-color: rgb(0,0,0); } // 分割线样式 hr { margin: 10px 0px 30px 0px; } // 文章内标题样式（左边的竖线） .post-body h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 { border-left: 4px solid rgb(0,255,0); margin-left: -36px; padding-left: 32px; } // 去掉图片边框 .posts-expand .post-body img { border: none; padding: 0px; } .post-gallery .post-gallery-img img { padding: 3px; } //------------------------------------------------------------------------- .post, .page { margin-bottom: 40px; padding: 50px 30px 25px; -webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 14px #cacbcb; -moz-box-shadow: 0 0 14px #cacbcb; box-shadow: 0 0 14px #cacbcb; background: #fff; border-radius: 10px; } .posts-collapse .post{ margin: 30px 0 30px 3px; } .posts-expand .post-eof { display: block; margin: 0px auto 30px; width: 0; } .posts-expand .post-title { font-size: 24px border-left: #649ab6 8px solid; font-weight: 900; padding-left: 10px; } .posts-expand .post-meta { margin: 3px 0 40px 0; } .posts-expand .post-title, .posts-expand .post-meta { text-align: left; } document.querySelectorAll('.github-emoji') .forEach(el => { if (!el.dataset.src) { return; } const img = document.createElement('img'); img.style = 'display:none !important;'; img.src = el.dataset.src; img.addEventListener('error', () => { img.remove(); el.style.color = 'inherit'; el.style.backgroundImage = 'none'; el.style.background = 'none'; }); img.addEventListener('load', () => { img.remove(); }); document.body.appendChild(img); });

entry.title: 一个小迷宫游戏
记一次夜不归宿的经历
暑假实训项目之计算器
entry.content: 就是一个用来熟悉html的小项目，非常简单。先贴上代码，如图所示，保存为 .html文件，用浏览器打开即可运行。12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152<html><head> <meta http-equiv ="Content-type" content="text/html;charset=utf-8"/> <title>简单计算器</title> <script language="javascript"> function fun_test(op){ var fnum=parseInt(document.Mycount.firstNumber.value); var snum=parseInt(document.Mycount.secondNumber.value); var rs=0; if(op=='+'){ rs=fnum+snum; } if(op=='-'){ rs=fnum-snum; } if(op=='*'){ rs=fnum*snum; } if(op=='/'){ rs=fnum/snum; } document.Mycount.result.value=rs; } </script></head> <body> <form name="Mycount"> <table> <tr> <td>第一个数：</td> <td><input type="text" name="firstNumber"></td> <tr> <tr> <td>第二个数：</td> <td><input type="text" name="secondNumber"></td> <tr> <tr> <td>计算结果：</td> <td><input type="text" name="result" readonly="true"></td> <tr> <tr> <td colspan="3"> <input type="button" name="but1" value="+" onClick="fun_test('+')"> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <input type="button" name="but2" value="-" onClick="fun_test('-')"> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <input type="button" name="but3" value="*" onClick="fun_test('*')"> &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <input type="button" name="but4" value="/" onClick="fun_test('/')"> </td> <tr/> </table> </form> </body></html> 效果如下图所示 document.querySelectorAll('.github-emoji') .forEach(el => { if (!el.dataset.src) { return; } const img = document.createElement('img'); img.style = 'display:none !important;'; img.src = el.dataset.src; img.addEventListener('error', () => { img.remove(); el.style.color = 'inherit'; el.style.backgroundImage = 'none'; el.style.background = 'none'; }); img.addEventListener('load', () => { img.remove(); }); document.body.appendChild(img); });

entry.title: 暑假实训项目之仿QQ农场
entry.content: 用来模仿QQ农场的各种功能，当然不可能很完善啦，毕竟QQ农场是腾讯一个团队做出来的，这个只是效果上实现一下，实际上还有很多bug，下方的按钮可以播放音乐，先贴上源代码吧。这是音乐图片的资源文件 百度云资源：仿QQ农场项目123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100101102103104105106107108109110111112113114115116117118119120<html><head> <meta http-equiv ="Content-type" content="text/html;charset=utf-8"/> <title>QQ农场</title> <script language="javascript">var stateflag=0;//状态变量 初始状态为0//改变状态 function fun_ChangeState(sflag){ if(sflag=='播种'){ stateflag=1; } if(sflag=='采摘'){ stateflag=2; } if(sflag=='翻地'){ stateflag=3; } } function fun_login(){ var userName=document.LoginForm.uname.value; var userPassword=document.LoginForm.upassword.value; // alert(userName + "您好，你的密码是" + userPassword); document.writeln(userName + "您好，你的密码是" + userPassword); } //换图 function fun_ChangePic(picflag){ if(stateflag==1){ //播种 document.getElementById(picflag).src='https://qqnongchang-1255814175.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/seed.jpg'; //3秒后自动发芽 setTimeout("fun_Bud("+picflag+")",3000); } if(stateflag==2){ //采摘 document.getElementById(picflag).src='https://qqnongchang-1255814175.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/harvest.png'; } if(stateflag==3){ //翻地 document.getElementById(picflag).src='https://qqnongchang-1255814175.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/chanzi.jpg'; setTimeout("fun_huifu("+picflag+")",1500); } } //发芽 function fun_Bud(budid){ document.getElementById(budid).src='https://qqnongchang-1255814175.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/bud.jpg'; //3秒后自动挂果 setTimeout("fun_flower("+budid+")",3000); } //挂果 function fun_flower(fid){ document.getElementById(fid).src='https://qqnongchang-1255814175.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/flower.png'; } //恢复原样 function fun_huifu(fuyuan){ document.getElementById(fuyaun).src='https://qqnongchang-1255814175.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/none.jpg'; } //换音乐 function fun_ChangeMusic(){ //document.getElementById(100).src='./image/9277.mp3'; document.Mymusic.music1.src='https://qqnongchang-1255814175.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/jiandanai.mp3'; } </script></head><body><input type="button" name="btn1" value="播种" onclick="fun_ChangeState('播种')" ><input type="button" name="btn2" value="采摘" onclick="fun_ChangeState('采摘')" ><input type="button" name="btn3" value="翻地" onclick="fun_ChangeState('翻地')" ><hr color="red"><table><tr> <td><image src=https://qqnongchang-1255814175.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/none.jpg id ="0" onclick="fun_ChangePic(this.id)"></td> <td><image src=https://qqnongchang-1255814175.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/none.jpg id ="1" onclick="fun_ChangePic(this.id)"></td> <td><image src=https://qqnongchang-1255814175.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/none.jpg id ="2" onclick="fun_ChangePic(this.id)"></td> <td><image src=https://qqnongchang-1255814175.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/none.jpg id ="3" onclick="fun_ChangePic(this.id)"></td> <td><image src=https://qqnongchang-1255814175.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/none.jpg id ="4" onclick="fun_ChangePic(this.id)"></td> <td><image src=https://qqnongchang-1255814175.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/none.jpg id ="5" onclick="fun_ChangePic(this.id)"></td></tr><tr> <td><image src=https://qqnongchang-1255814175.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/none.jpg id ="6" onclick="fun_ChangePic(this.id)"></td> <td><image src=https://qqnongchang-1255814175.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/none.jpg id ="7" onclick="fun_ChangePic(this.id)"></td> <td><image src=https://qqnongchang-1255814175.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/none.jpg id ="8" onclick="fun_ChangePic(this.id)"></td> <td><image src=https://qqnongchang-1255814175.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/none.jpg id ="9" onclick="fun_ChangePic(this.id)"></td> <td><image src=https://qqnongchang-1255814175.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/none.jpg id ="10" onclick="fun_ChangePic(this.id)"></td> <td><image src=https://qqnongchang-1255814175.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/none.jpg id ="11" onclick="fun_ChangePic(this.id)"></td></tr><tr> <td><image src=https://qqnongchang-1255814175.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/none.jpg id ="12" onclick="fun_ChangePic(this.id)"></td> <td><image src=https://qqnongchang-1255814175.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/none.jpg id ="13" onclick="fun_ChangePic(this.id)"></td> <td><image src=https://qqnongchang-1255814175.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/none.jpg id ="14" onclick="fun_ChangePic(this.id)"></td> <td><image src=https://qqnongchang-1255814175.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/none.jpg id ="15" onclick="fun_ChangePic(this.id)"></td> <td><image src=https://qqnongchang-1255814175.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/none.jpg id ="16" onclick="fun_ChangePic(this.id)"></td> <td><image src=https://qqnongchang-1255814175.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/none.jpg id ="17" onclick="fun_ChangePic(this.id)"></td></tr></table><hr color="green"><form name="LoginForm"><div style=background-color:#0C0; width:200px;heigth:500px;><table><tr> <td>用户名:</td> <td><input type="text" name="uname"></td> </tr><tr> <td>密码:</td> <td><input type="password" name="upassword"></td></tr><tr> <td><input type="button" name="login" value="登 录" onClick="fun_login()"></td></tr></table></div></form><hr color="blue"> <form name="Mymusic"><embed src=https://qqnongchang-1255814175.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/9277.mp3 id="100" name="music1"><input type="button" name="btn4" value="9277" onclick="fun_ChangeMusic()" ><input type="button" name="btn5" value="简单爱" onclick="fun_ChangeMusic()" ></form></body></html> 效果如下(翻地的时候出点小bug，貌似用错了图片？) document.querySelectorAll('.github-emoji') .forEach(el => { if (!el.dataset.src) { return; } const img = document.createElement('img'); img.style = 'display:none !important;'; img.src = el.dataset.src; img.addEventListener('error', () => { img.remove(); el.style.color = 'inherit'; el.style.backgroundImage = 'none'; el.style.background = 'none'; }); img.addEventListener('load', () => { img.remove(); }); document.body.appendChild(img); });

entry.title: 光头最强，不接受反驳
entry.content: (function(){var player = new DPlayer({"container":document.getElementById("dplayer3"),"video":{"url":"https://myvideo-1255814175.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/%E5%90%89%E8%AF%BA%E6%AF%94%E5%88%A9.mp4"},"danmaku":{"api":"https://api.prprpr.me/dplayer/"}});window.dplayers||(window.dplayers=[]);window.dplayers.push(player);})()马努·吉诺比利顺境跑车逆境佛，绝境妖刀斩群魔。 (function(){var player = new DPlayer({"container":document.getElementById("dplayer4"),"video":{"url":"https://myvideo-1255814175.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/jason.mp4"},"danmaku":{"api":"https://api.prprpr.me/dplayer/"}});window.dplayers||(window.dplayers=[]);window.dplayers.push(player);})()杰森·斯坦森跳水运动员去演了电影，对跳水界和电影界都是一个拯救。 视频转载自网易云，B站 document.querySelectorAll('.github-emoji') .forEach(el => { if (!el.dataset.src) { return; } const img = document.createElement('img'); img.style = 'display:none !important;'; img.src = el.dataset.src; img.addEventListener('error', () => { img.remove(); el.style.color = 'inherit'; el.style.backgroundImage = 'none'; el.style.background = 'none'; }); img.addEventListener('load', () => { img.remove(); }); document.body.appendChild(img); });
